entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries early this evening. Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
